title: A 3D organoid platform that supports liver-stage P.falciparum infection can be used to identify intrahepatic antimalarial drugs
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Shringar Rao, Shahla Romal, Bram Torenvliet, Johan A. Slotman, Tonnie Huijs, Tokameh Mahmoudi
